alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Coal; Hughes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 12:26AM CDT until May 12 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... Central Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... South central Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1225 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Alderson to near Lehigh, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atoka, Coalgate, Stringtown, Lehigh, Tupelo, Bromide, Gerty, Centrahoma, Clarita, Olney, Wardville, Daisy, Phillips, Atoka Reservoir, Chockie, northern McGee Creek Lake, and Redden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
